item.description:
Does anyone have any great wine bar suggestions? I'd like to plan a Wine & Cheese Social for April or May. Please send all wine bar suggestions to moxieinthecity@aol.com.



DATING QUESTIONS NEEDED FOR ADVICE COLUMN!-YOUR FEEDBACK WANTED!
Got a dating related question? Want free advice from Moxie and dozens of other national and international singles? Ask Away. It's Free! Look for Moxie's response and feedback from other singles. (Responses take between 6-36 hours.) Ask Away - http://www.moxieinthe...



Whatever Happened to Manners?
Name: D' licious | Location: Boston , MA |Question: So many of my girlfriends are always talking about the guy that just stops calling. Whats up with that? It seems like a growing trend in the adult dating scene. Isn't it just common courtesy to say Something??!! But to not say Anything!!! I don't get it?
And I'm not talking after just 1 or 2 dates either. I'm talking about well into the dating relationship.
READ THE REST OF THE POST & COMMENT http://moxieblog.type...


GIRLS NIGHT OUT/BACHELORETTE PARTY IDEAS:
Plan a Private Sx Ed Salon or Exotic Dance Class for you and your friends! Great idea for a bachelorette party, birthday party or Girl's Night Out! We can come to your home or rent a private space for you and your group. Get more details here: http://www.moxieinthe...

PICK UP HOT TIPS - FLIRT SMARTER, DATE SMARTER, WRITE A BETTER ONLIEN DATING PROFILE AND BLOW HIS MIND IN BED!
Download our manuals!
http://www.moxieinthe...
